title: UiMei 6mm Briolette 750pcs Crystal Glass Beads Faceted Rondelle Shape Crystal Spacer Beads for Bracelet Necklace Decorative Hand Jewelry Making - Aquamarine
features: 【PACKAGING and SIZE】 Package includes 750Pcs Rondelle crystal glass beads in aquamarine color，90pcs for each beads strand. Diameter: 6mm, Height: 4mm.In addition, we give you some elastic rope. let your family and friends enjoy DIY happy time together.

【QUALITY MATERIAL】Made of quality crystal glass (synthetic quartz),odorless and non-toxic.The crystal beads have 48 triangular facets,multi-faceted cutting,not easy to break or deform and durable. For you to choose and match according to your actual needs.

【KINDLY NOTE】Glass beads are fragile items and after multiple shipments，so will have some problems such as abrasion，chip and slight scratch on the surface.This is a common phenomenon. In order to compensate for these possible problems,we also give you more beads.Thanks for your understanding.

【MULTIPLE USES】Our products are perfect for all types of DIY beading and jewelry making,and can also for beads curtain, cloth decoration, bracelets, necklaces, earrings, doll, etc. Whether you are a beginner or a professional craft-lover, you will love this jewelry making.If you are satisfied with the jewelry, welcome to share your creation in the comment area,thank you.

【SERVICE GUARANTEE】Our products are carefully inspected and packaged,and provide 90 days 100% return or refund.We value our customers in a big way.We are always here to assist if you have any quality issue of the item,thank you.
description: Welcome to the store Glass Crystal Beads !Super sparkly and adorable.! Faceted rondelle colorful glass crystal beads can add some distinctive style on your DIY projects and make them stand out. Ideal for DIY your own supplies for all kinds of jewelry making,such as pendant, bracelet, earrings, necklace,curtains,dress decoration, all kinds of animal dolls and other craft decoration! This faceted rondelle glass crystal beads will exceed your expectations and will great choice for many kinds of diy projects and jewelry making.Start your craft journey just from here! Product details: Made of premium crystal glass Environmentally friendly, no odor.Faceted rondelle shape which are colorful, vivid and sparkly precisely manufactured to provide a smooth surface and perfect finish. Product Details Package includes 750Pcs Rondelle crystal glass beads，90pcs for each beads strand. Diameter: 6mm, Height:4mm.Reminder:Please make sure these small beads meet your need before placing an order, thank you. Cleaning and care Avoid chemicals Avoid bumps and scratches Clean jewelry occasionally with a soft cloth The store warm tips for you 1.Small parts, please keep away from children under 3 years old. 2.There may be ±0.1mm error in bead sizing duo to manual measurement and a little color difference of the beads due to the influence of light, monitor's brightness/contrast etc. If you have any quality problems with the goods, we are always here to help you and wish you a happy shopping, thank you.
